title: Interstitial - Linked Account
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When a user who fall into the subscription offer criteria
logs in with their linked account
custom_expected: Then the interstitial is displayed in the app

title: Launching Paywall from Interstitial
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is eligible for subscription offers
custom_steps:
When the user is prompted with the interstitial
and taps on the interstitial image
custom_expected: Then the subscription offers paywall will launch

title: Dismissing Interstitial
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is eligible for subscription offers
custom_steps:
When the user is prompted with the interstitial
and taps anywhere outside of the interstitial
custom_expected: Then the interstitial will be dismissed

title: Interstitial Re-Display
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is eligible for subscription offers
custom_steps:
When the user is prompted with the interstitial
and has tapped to dismiss the interstitial
custom_expected: Then the interstitial should re-display after 24hrs and then not show again

title: More Menu
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is eligible for subscription offers
custom_steps: When the user navs to the More Menu
custom_expected: Then the user will see a "Special Offers" option underneath "Ask MLB"

title: More Menu - Launching Paywall
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is eligible for subscription offers
custom_steps:
When the user navs to the More Menu
and taps on "Special Offers"
custom_expected: Then the subscription offers paywall will launch

title: MLB.TV EPG Upsell
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is eligible for subscription offers
custom_steps: When the user opens the MLB.TV EPG via the TV icon in the top left corner
custom_expected: Then the user will see a "Resubscribe" upsell atop the EPG

title: MLB.TV EPG - Launching Paywall
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is eligible for subscription offers
custom_steps:
When the user navs to the MLB.TV EPG
and taps on Resubscribe upsell
custom_expected: Then the subscription offers paywall will launch

title: "Resubscribe" from Paywall
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is eligible for subscription offers
custom_steps:
When the user has launched the subscription offers paywall
and taps to "Resubscribe"
custom_expected: Then the user will be presented with the App Store flow to resubscribe

title: Entitlements
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is eligible for subscription offers
custom_steps: When the user has successfully resubscribed from the subscription offers paywall
custom_expected:
Then the user should be properly entitled
and should be able to launch TV and Audio feeds

title: Special Offers Promo
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is eligible for subscription offers
custom_steps: When the user has successfully resubscribed from the subscription offers paywall
custom_expected:
Then the user should no longer see any promotions in the app for the Special Offers
(More Menu, MLB.TV EPG upsell)

title: Subsequent Launches of App
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is eligible for subscription offers
custom_steps:
When the user has successfully resubscribed from the subscription offers paywall
and has killed the app and re-launched
custom_expected:
Then the user should remain properly entitled 
and should be able to launch TV and Audio feeds
